information:
Dear mentor

This form helps you to check and evaluate Task5 Cat API https://github.com/rolling-scopes-school/Android-2020-Task-5

You have to
1. check the projects of your students according to task5 conditions
2. provide code review to your students and share the best practices to solve these kinds of challenges
3. rate the student's work from 0 (nothing done) to 120 (perfect work + additonal requirements) and submit the score on https://app.rs.school/course/mentor/submit-review?course=android-2021

If there are nuances that are not described in this form, interpret them by yourself (decreasing or increasing the score) at your discretion. Guide by common sense in this case üëæ

criteria.text: Cats are displayed on device from https://docs.thecatapi.com/ using Retrofit to call Rest API. Glide or Coil (or other lib) was implemented as well to show cat-pictures.
Pagination was implemented. RecyclerView should upload fresh portion of cats every time it reaches the end of the list.
Full image screen was implemented. After clicking the cat-picture in the RecyclerView full screen should be opened with card flip animation.
Static code analyzers (1.detekt and 2.ktlint) were added to the project
Saving cat-image to the Galery was implemented
ADDITIONAL: Kotlin scripts for build system were implemented
Error-prone code (memory leaks, poor architecture style which leads to errors, etc.)

Messy and poor style of code:

abuse of !!, lateinit, etc.
poor variable naming
non-functional extra code
etc.
Some non-critical crashes during the work (during rotates, moves between screens, etc.)
